title: Low-Regularity Global solution for fractional NLS in modulation spaces
authors: Divyang G. Bhimani, Diksha Dhingra and Vijay Kumar Sohani
abstract:
We establish global well-posedness for the mass sub-critical nonlinear
fractional Schr\"odinger equation
  $$iu_t + (-\Delta)^\frac{\beta}{2} u \pm (|u|^{\alpha}u)=0$$
  with radial initial data in modulation spaces $M^{p,\frac{p}{p-1}}(\mathbb
R^n)$ with $2<p$ sufficiently close to $2.$ Our order of dispersion $\beta$
lies in $(2n/ (2n-1), 2)$ for $n \geq 2$.
